text: Robert de Nesle (1906–1978) was a French film producer.Diawara p.32 He controlled the production company Comptoir Français de Productions Cinématographiques (CFPC). ==Selected filmography== * Soyez les bienvenus (1953) * After You Duchess (1954) * Le Vicomte de Bragelonne (film) (1954) * Judex (1963) * The Exterminators (film) (1965) * Trap for the Assassin (1966) * Mexican Slayride (1967) * Coplan Saves His Skin (1968) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Manthia Diawara. African Cinema: Politics & Culture. Indiana University Press, 1992. ==External links== * Category:1906 births Category:1978 deaths Category:French film producers Category:People from Rouen
title: Robert de Nesle
